newsitem.title: USA: Champion Parts weighs offer solicitation.
newsitem.headline: Champion Parts weighs offer solicitation.

text.p: Champion Parts Inc said Friday it is pursuing several options as part of ongoing restructuring discussions, including a solicitation of offers from parties who previously expressed an interest in the company.
Champion said it is continuing negotiations with an ad hoc vendor panel on restructuring options, which may not require the injection of additional funds into the company.

Champion said that previously disclosed negotiations were discontinued between the company, an ad hoc panel representing certain unsecured creditors and Raymond Perelman, a principal shareholder and director, to settle certain unsecured obligations and recapitalize the company.
Champion remanufactures fuel systems, front wheel drive assembly components and electrical and mechanical products for the automotive market.
